PROFILECONFIG_DESCRIPTION: With this command you will be able to customize your profile card in various ways
PC_INTRO:
<:_:979009081325019156> **Introduction**: Set an introductionary message
<:_:979009081325019156> **Favorite Character**: Select your favorite character
<:_:979009081325019156> **Display Card**: Choose a card to be displayed on your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Background**: Set a background for your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Font Color**: Change your profile's text color
<:_:979009081325019156> **Profile Glow**: Apply a glowing effect to your profile
<:_:979009081325019156> **Badges**: Display badges on your profile
TYPE_FAV_CHAR: Enter the name of your favorite character
PROVIDE_FAV_CC: Enter the code of the card you want to display on your profile
NON_TRADABLE_NOTE: Profile backgrounds cannot be traded in any way
NEED_MIN_AWARDS: You need a minimum of **6** badges in order to use this option
PROVIDE_ACH_ID: Badges on your profile are displayed from left to right
SET_FC_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to set **{{character}}** from **{{series}}** as your favorite character?
CANNOT_SET_PBG: {{author}} You dont have enough **{{currency}}** to buy this profile background
GLOW_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} The **Glow** code you provided is either invalid or not in your inventory
PROVIDE_PBG_ID: {{author}} Please enter the ID of the background you want to buy
NON_TRADABLE_FOOTER: This process will overwrite your current background
INTRO_TOO_LONG: {{author}} Your introduction message can only be **90** characters long
SET_INTRO_CONFIRM:
Are you sure you want to display the following text on your profile?

```fix
{{intro}}
```
SET_GLOW_CODE: Are you sure you want to apply the **{{glowName}}** **Glow** to your profile's background?
SET_CARD_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to set **{{card}}** as your display card?
SET_BG_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to buy the **{{selectedbg}}** background for **{{amount}}** {{emoji}}?
CANNOT_FIND_ACH: {{user}} You don't have any achievements with the following IDs: {{ids}}
MAX_AWARDS_DISPLAY: {{author}} You can only display a maximum of **6** badges on your profile
SET_AWARDS_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to display the badges ({{awards}}) on your profile?
PC_CHARACTER_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} Could not find any character with that name
SUCCESSFUL_CHARACTER: {{author}} Successfully set **{{characterName}}** as your favorite character
SUCCESSFUL_DISPLAY_CARD: {{author}} Successfully set **{{characterName}}** as your display card
SUCCESSFUL_BACKGROUND: {{author}} Successfuly set **{{backgroundName}}** as your profile's background
SUCCESSFUL_FONT_COLOR: {{author}} Successfully applied the **{{glowName}}** **Glow** to your profile's font
SUCCESSFUL_AWARDS: {{author}} Successfully placed the selected badges onto your profile
SET_FONT_GLOW: Are you sure you want to apply the **{{glowName}}** **Glow** to your profile's font?
